ComicInfo.Title: The Serpent of Midgard Conclusion: This Battleground Earth
ComicInfo.Summary: The Serpent of Midgard Conclusion: This Battleground Earth: Odin and the other gods, driven to Midgard by Tyr and Loki make a last stand in Long Island with the help of Thor.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:33:43. [Issue ID 37067]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Nurse Stevens,Volstagg],Hamir the Fisherman (a storm giant),Thor,Tony Stark,The Midgard Serpent,Fandral,Loki,Hrungnir,Balder,Warriors Three [Hogun,Tyr,Storm Giants,Sif,Heimdall,Odin
